f_template.body:
<launch> <arg name="temoto_namespace" default="$(arg temoto_ws_name)"/> <arg name="extra_wake_words" default="everybody"/> <arg name="actions_path" default="$(find $(arg temoto_ws_name))/../temoto_actions" />
<env name="ROSCONSOLE_FORMAT" value="[${function}] ${message}" /> <env name="ROSCONSOLE_CONFIG_FILE" value="$(find $(arg temoto_ws_name))/config/console.conf" />
<group ns="$(arg temoto_namespace)"> <node name="temoto_er_manager" pkg="temoto_er_manager" type="temoto_er_manager" output="screen" /> <node name="temoto_component_manager" pkg="temoto_component_manager" type="temoto_component_manager" output="screen" /> <node name="temoto_action_engine" pkg="temoto_action_engine" type="action_engine_node" output="screen" args="--wake-word $(arg temoto_namespace) --actions-path $(arg actions_path) --extra-wake-words $(arg extra_wake_words)" /> </group> </launch>
